last_episode_to_air.name: Solitary
last_episode_to_air.overview: Now in custody, separated from Muhammad, Lee Malvo's defense team battle to save him from the death penalty. Malvo must decide whether to betray his "father" to save his own life.

name: I, Sniper
overview: The D.C. sniper attacks of 2002, as told by the surviving shooter himself.

episodes.name: The Road to Washington, D.C.
episodes.overview: A chance meeting between Lee Malvo, a Jamaican teenager seeking a father figure, and John Muhammad, a disaffected US Army veteran, sets in motion a murderous road trip.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: The snipers travel to the nation's capital to begin their reign of terror, firing out of the trunk of their Chevy Caprice. In 24 hours, they leave four dead and a city in alarm.

episodes.name: Death Stole My Soul
episodes.overview: As the snipers claim two more victims, ballistics confirm all the shootings are connected. But investigators have no leads apart from the alleged sighting of a white box truck.

episodes.name: Call Me God
episodes.overview: The killing zone expands and the snipers shoot a 13-year-old boy. As 24-hour news media turns their spotlight on the police, the snipers' message is clear: no one is safe.

episodes.name: He Told Me He Loved Me
episodes.overview: As their killing spree continues, Malvo reveals the true nature of his relationship with Muhammad. But their bond starts to buckle under the strain of the killings.

episodes.name: Your Children Are Not Safe
episodes.overview: With 9 dead, the snipers play a high stakes game, leaving a series of cryptic clues for the police. The net is closing in, but not before the snipers are able to kill again.

episodes.name: Solitary
episodes.overview: Now in custody, separated from Muhammad, Lee Malvo's defense team battle to save him from the death penalty. Malvo must decide whether to betray his "father" to save his own life.
